thread.title: Healthy Smoothie Bowl Recipes
thread.title_full: Healthy Smoothie Bowl Recipes | POPSUGAR Fitness

author: Kelli Acciardo
title: Healthy Smoothie Bowl Recipes
text:
Smoothies are a classic go-to breakfast option, given their versatility and quick turnaround time, but when you put them into a bowl and add a few aesthetically designed rows of fruit, you're met with a total game changer â€” you now have a work of art. And who doesn't like starting the day with something as pleasing to the eye as it is to the palate?
Related:
How Adding Flaxmeal to My Smoothies Helped Me Lose Weight
